database.name: Blog
database.description:
Creates a Blog System to publish your content. Guest users can comment in post and display after admin aproval.

Features
- Admin Section to update post and categorys
- Admin section to check and accept comments
- Add a link in Web Site menu
- Add a top menu in admin panel
database.author: Reazaul Karim
database.help:
Guide line
- Click "ACTIVATE" link to install it.
